metadata.title: Contact Costa Spanish Academy | Learn Spanish Online
metadata.description: Get in touch with Costa Spanish Academy. Ask about courses, schedules, trial lessons, or business training. Personalized attention in English or Spanish.

title: Have a question?

intro.p1: We’re here to help. Fill out the form or contact us by email, WhatsApp or phone. Our Customer Care Team will guide you and make sure you get the best experience.
intro.p2: You can ask about course prices, availability, schedules, trial lessons, group or private classes, corporate training, or any other question.
intro.p3: Response time: everyone gets a personalized reply. Please allow up to 24 hours during business hours. Our business hours are Monday–Friday, 9:00–20:00.
intro.privacy: Privacy: your details are used only to reply to your request. We do not share your information.
